Golden Rule Lawn Care  #00000

is the first company to offer a reduced cost to Klahanie families for consistent year-around yard care. Their price of $80 (+tax) a month for the front yard is currently giving close to 200 families 26 visits a year for mowing, weeding, pruning and clean up. Back yard service is also available.
